Description: Pottery ostracon: three fragments re-joined. The text comprises a Schutzbrief/asylum written in Coptic.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Curator's comments: Written in the same hand as O.Crum 440.
Bibliographic references: Till 1964 / Die koptischen Rechtsurkunden aus Theben (p. 48)
Till 1938 / Koptische Schutzbriefe. Mit einem rechtsgeschichtlichen Beitrag von Herbert Libesny (p. 93, no. 40)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390756) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390756)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 108 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
